page.title: 20FARMING FACTS BENTWORTH
page.content: POPULATION EDUCATION Weller's Place Farm has 180 cows.The cows are Friesians.They eat grass, silage,beat pulp,concentrates.They milk twice a day.They have 180 cows in calf which means that they can milk them.They have 50, heifers in calf. They have 55 calves.They have 1 dog which is a golden labrador & 4 cats. Amongst the 5 Farms in Bentworth there are 38 grass fields and 49 corn fields and only 4 cereal fields.Leroy Lewis's farm has got 4 barns and he owns 200 acres.Mrs Nitch Smith's farm has got 3 barns and 250 acres.Mr Gordon James has 4 barns & 192 acres.Mrs Leighwood & Mrs Robertson have 2 barns & 600 acres. by Terri & John.
